original_text: God has said what the people can do on the Sabbath day of rest. On the day of rest, the people must do only those things. They must respect the Lord's house. I am the Lord.
korean_text: 내 안식일을 지키고 내 성소를 귀히 여기라 나는 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: God has said what the people can do
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 백성들이 무엇을 할 수 있는지 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: on the Sabbath day of rest
the people must do only those things
They must respect the Lord's house
